Back to <nowiki>[[Bugs/Triaging]]</nowiki>

GNOME uses Bugzilla for tracking bugs and can be found here: <nowiki>[[http://bugzilla.gnome.org/|GNOME Bug Tracking System]]</nowiki>.
At its wiki is a guide that contains specific information for GNOME packages, that list can be found here: <nowiki>[[http://live.gnome.org/Bugsquad/TriageGuide/ProductSpecificGuidelines|Product Specific Guidelines]]</nowiki>. This list is updated by the maintainers of the packages.
